mapper.select: SELECT NVL((SELECT 1 FROM cart WHERE m_id = #{m_id} AND pro_num = #{pro_num}), 0) state FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cart_num, cart_goodsCount, pro_num, m_id) VALUES(cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cart_goodsCount}, #{pro_num}, #{m_id})
mapper.select: SELECT cart_num, cart_goodsCount, m_id, p.pro_num, pro_size, pro_color, pr_name, p.pr_price, pr_thumb FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.pro_num = p.pro_num INNER JOIN pr_detail pr ON p.pr_num = pr.pr_num WHERE m_id = #{m_id} and (SYSDATE - cart_regdate) < 7 ORDER BY cart_regdate
